MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a further update for customers affected by the unplanned power cut in the FK13 postcode area of Tillicoultry. Engineers have completed the repairs to faulty equipment within Mayfield substation. Our engineers and contractors are continuing the safety checks on individual properties and we still expect all power to be restored by midnight. Hot food and drinks are now available at Murray Square. We understand that to be without power is frustrating and we apologise for this. We will update this message if this information changes. Thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:34 PM on Thursday, 24 December 2020.
